text: I want to make certain I’m not misinterpreted on this opening statement: The cure of COVID-19 is not in Chloroquine. The best-proven prescription, at least for now, is reducing crowds and social distancing.  #Chloroquine #Churchill #Covid19 #cure #Media #N https://t.co/7oeHm8VRuE https://t.co/5Xb5rNppRN
